data.text: @69L46 @wsbgnl They were "shirking." They have now used the guidelines to "absolve."

@wsbgnl The new plan absolves them of all responsibilities.
@wsbgnl @BittaHoneyNY Oh, it addresses it alright ... just not the way most of us like it to. Their 'new plan' *IS* their address--their address to not address that. https://t.co/Tb5LImEGxG

@wsbgnl The new plan makes the failure of leadership to address its own inaction/tardiness easier for leadership to excuse. They shifted from more predictive metrics to less predictive ones, while shifting responsibility from leaders to individuals.
@wsbgnl It should be abundantly clear by now that our government is trying to kill us.
